name: Security Break-in (Mini-jam 59)
description:
This is a Mini-jam 59 Submission.

In a far distant future where humanity has been all but forgotten lies an old bunker. This bunker contains one of the world's most advanced AI, that due to it's inability to sprout legs. Has simply lie dormant and forgotten.

Unfortunately age cracked open it's shell and other robots flocked over in an attempt to destroy it for some indeterminable reason.

Controls are Arrow Keys and Mouse based.

Left Click and Right Click Build and Destroy turrets, and if you click on the minimap it'll act as a short hand to travel between views.

It's essentially a micro-managed tower-defense game, I'm honestly surprised I even got it to work to this point...

EDIT : Actual Controls

Arrow Keys : Navigate between rooms

Mouse Left Click : Building Turret or Selecting and Firing a turret of choice

You can also use mouse click to select the room on the minimap!

Mouse Right Click : Destroy Turrets ( when the round has not started )

Space : Close or open a door in the current room, or start the round
